title: Build error when using other than ASCII character for Binding Path of x:Bind

comments.body: Hi Kono, this is an issue with the x:Bind parser and I have opened a bug to address it in a future release of the SDK. In general, if the member name is valid in C#, it should be valid in x:Bind, too (if at all possible). Thanks for reporting this problem and thanks for providing a code/markup example!
